repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
Information by V Raghavan written in black ink pen on the paper. Information mentioned by Raghvan : Dinakarīya, (upamana and Śabdapariccheda) Dinakara Gratha, Nyāya, 280, 7 l. Number 8 is written in pencil and in roman script.
The first folio of the manuscript has discussion of vyāpti and anumiti so it's possible that it contains Anumāna kāṇḍa of the Dinakarī. Since many of the manuscript's folios are badly fractured and in fragile condition, it will take further research to determine the manuscript's exact content. Because the folio numbers are absent, it is difficult to determine how much material is missing.

msItem.title: Dinakarī
msItem.author: Dinakara
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 (few letters are lost) jekaṃ tat prakārakatve yasya ?bhavaṃ siṃ tvādikyāṃ .. na ca grastam iti agrastvaṃ .
msItem.explicit: xv 6 ityaupādānikaḥ yāgaviśeṣyakaḥ pañcamobodhaḥ sa??? pravartakaḥ upādāna ma

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 1 blank folio, 167 wriiten folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin. 12r is half blank.
supportDesc.condition: delicate, many folio are broken at the edges hence text is lost.

listBibl.bibl: Kārikāvalī, of Mahāmahopādhyāya Viśvanātha Pañcānana with the commentaries Muktāvalī Dīnakarī Rāmamudrī edi with foot notes by Ananth śāstry, published by Tukaram Jivaji Nirnayasagar Press Bombay 1916

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v 1 (few letters are lost) jekaṃ tat prakārakatve yasya ?bhavaṃ siṃ tvādikyāṃ .. na ca grastam iti agrastvaṃ . 12r 1 taṃ ceti nanu vyāpti(bhramā?)de vā numitirastu na ca ?mātmakaparāmarśajanyatvādanumiterbhramatvāpattiriti vācyaṃ viṣayañcāya 12r 2 syaiva bhramatvaniyāmakatvenadoṣābhāvādityatattra dṛśyate cetyapi kaścit vyāptīti padaniṣṭhavyāptījñānaśrutyānāmityarthaḥ . 12r 3 na ceti . 12v 1 (ṛeṭ letters are lost) kamiti bhāvaḥ śrutamiti naiyāyikaśabdajanyaśābdabodhaviṣayikatamityarthaḥ śrutadhānontātārthakatvena śābdatvaviśiṣṭaśakteḥ (broken edge some syllables are lost.)
xv 6 ityaupādānikaḥ yāgaviśeṣyakaḥ pañcamobodhaḥ sa??? pravartakaḥ upādāna ma
